DOC.detailed_description: The InForma project design mono-institutional randomize controlled 4-arm parallel-group trial . Potential study participant recruit among overweight obese breast cancer patient previously treat European Institute Oncology ( IEO ) . Potential study participant recruit breast cancer treatment ( surgery , chemotherapy and/or radiation ) complete . Study participant randomize one 4 arm : DI - Dietary Intervention ; PAI - Physical Activity Intervention ; PADI - Physical Activity Dietary Intervention ; LII - Less Intensive Intervention . Enrolled patient receive 6-month intervention follow end study period two additional follow-up visit 12- 24-month . The main aim study evaluate impact intervention programme body weight change overweight obese breast cancer patient .
